app.description: Checks comment against requester's preferred language.
app.name: LanguageChecker

modal.warning: It appears you are submitting a comment that doesn't match the requester's preferred language.  Are you sure you want to submit?

submit.close: Your submission has been canceled because you didn't choose an option. Please re-submit.
submit.timeout: Your submission has been canceled because you didn't choose an option within 20 seconds. Please re-submit.
submit.cancel: Your submission has been canceled because you hit cancel.
